title: Leidolf
text: Leidolf was a manufacturer of <a href="optical">optical</a> equipment situated in <a href="Wetzlar">Wetzlar</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a>. It was founded by Rudolf Leidolf in 1921, initially producing <a href="lens%20%28optics%29">lens</a>es for <a href="microscope">microscope</a>s. In 1948 camera production was started and in 1962 the factory ceased operations. Leidolf is in no way related to Leitz (the manufacturer of <a href="Leica%20Camera">Leica</a>), even though Wetzlar has been the historical location for both companies.
